section.title: Training & Courses We Offer
section.subtitle: Learn new skills, become job-ready, and transform your future
section.description: Every skill you learn here is a step toward independence and lifelong impact.
section.ctaText: Ready to change your life? Join thousands who have already transformed their future through our programs.

courses.name: Basic Professional Beautician
courses.tagline: Start your beauty career with comprehensive foundational training
courses.description: Complete basic beautician training covering threading, waxing, manicure, pedicure, facial, clean up, bleach, head massage, hair cutting, and root touch up techniques.

courses.name: Professional Beautician (Advanced)
courses.tagline: Master advanced beauty techniques and become industry-ready
courses.description: Comprehensive professional training covering full face threading, waxing techniques (Rica, Brazilian), body waxing, advanced manicure/pedicure, facial techniques, and more.
topics: Different types of wax (Rica, Brazilian Max)
Role on wax & Full face/body waxing
Types of acne, pimples, and pigmentation
Facial massage techniques & Skin PH level
Bridal facial & Peel off mask facial

courses.name: Professional Hair Styling Course
courses.tagline: Transform into a professional hair artist
courses.description: Specialized hair styling course covering hair straightening, carrotting, botox, highlighting, and professional hair cutting techniques.

courses.name: Professional Makeup Artist Course
courses.tagline: Master the art of makeup and create stunning transformations
courses.description: Complete makeup artistry training covering theory, face shapes, color correction, eye makeup, contouring, and all types of draping techniques.
topics: Multi coloured & Smudged wing liner application
Lip shapes, lipstick types and application
Hair styling (Basics, Blow dry, Party & Bridal)

courses.name: Mehandi Professional Artist - Level 1
courses.tagline: Learn traditional and modern mehandi art from basics
courses.description: Foundational mehandi course covering basic elements, thick & thin lines, belts, grids, floral vines, Arabic design, Mandala style, and Indian bridal demonstration.

courses.name: Mehandi Professional Artist - Level 2
courses.tagline: Advanced mehandi designs for professional artists
courses.description: Advanced mehandi training focusing on intricate designs, peacock theme, cutwork, florals, bridal elements, and social media branding.

courses.name: Mehandi Professional Artist - Level 3
courses.tagline: Master level mehandi artistry for portrait and bridal work
courses.description: Expert-level mehandi training specializing in portrait mehandi and intricate bridal designs.
